title: President Donald J. Trump Is Accelerating America’s Leadership in Artificial Intelligence – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Infrastructure & Technology	

Issued on:
February 11, 2019
Continued American leadership in Artificial Intelligence is of paramount importance to maintaining the economic and national security of the United States.
						President Donald J. Trump					ADVANCING TECHNOLOGY: President Trump is directing the Federal Government to prioritize research and development of America’s artificial intelligence (AI) capabilities.DRIVING BREAKTHROUGHS: Developing America’s ability to leverage AI is critical to increasing prosperity, enhancing our national and economic security, and protecting our values.VISIONARY LEADERSHIP: President Trump is committed to enacting policies that promote and protect American leadership in technological development and innovation.
